ModMetaData.name: Parabellum
ModMetaData.author: XxNelsonxX
ModMetaData.description:
Si vis pacem, para bellum - If you want peace, prepare for war
The main purpose of this mod was adding more weapon for the base HSK, I feels weid that some ammo type is just available for a single weapon, not so good for production chain, variety and logistic, so I want to fill those gaps first before adding anything else.
But now it also add custom weapons, ammo, explosives and turrets, any suggestion, feedback and bug report is always welcome!(I really need those)
+(New) Also New Research and small compatibility patch with Vile's Pre-Industrial mod
Sorry that I don't speak russian, also I am not a native English speaker, but I do speak English, Spanish and Chinese, so you are free to correct any typo I made and anyone is free to translate my mod to any other language if you want.
Moved the changelog to separated text file
